# Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH)

![pre-verification]

This crate provides an API for performing elliptic curve
Diffie-Hellman. Currently supported curves are Curve 25519 and NIST
curve P256.

Depending on the platform and available features the most
efficient implementation is chosen.

While the underlying implementations in HACL and libjade are verified,
the API built on top is not, yet.

## x25519
For x25519 the portable HACL implementation is used unless running on an x64
CPU with BMI2 and ADX support. In this case the libjade implementation is
used.

## P256
For P256 the portable HACL implementation is used.

[verified]: https://img.shields.io/badge/verified-brightgreen.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,
[pre-verification]: https://img.shields.io/badge/pre_verification-orange.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,
